name: Shapeshifter (Agent_Jo)
description:
Shapeshifter Gameplay

You have to move through an infinite mansion and complete tasks, while an evil Shapeshifter with murderous intent is following behind you. Remember all objects in the room and kill the odd one out.

Content
  • 15 different rooms with different layouts and completely randomized objects
  • Over 10 different objects to get deceived with
  • A unique gameplay experience every time
  • An adaptive soundtrack 
Controls
  • Aim with your mouse
  • LMB to interact
  • RMB to move forward
  • Hold LMB, press RMB to take a guess
Spooky 2D Jam 2021

This game was created for the Spooky 2D Jam 2021 hosted by Theo Clarke. The theme for the jam was Behind You. The time limit was 48 hours. This is a solo entry and there are no premade assets.

Music

1 song with 5 different intensity levels + 2 atmospheric sounds + 1 detuned song for the radio.

Credits
  • Game Design: me
  • Code: me (using Unity & Visual Studio 2019)
  • Music: me (using FL Studio 20 - Producer Edition)
  • Art: me (using Krita)
  • Sound Effects: freesound.org
Links
  • My YT channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1Od4iYshEhNFfgUCRr0ccA
  • You can find and download all my music here: https://agentjo.newgrounds.com/
